item.title: Checklist for Data Cleansing
item.description: What this post is about: Data cleansing in practice with R Data analysis, in practice, consists typically of some different steps which can be subsumed as “preparing data” and “model data” (not considering communication here): (Inspired by this) Often, the first major part – “prepare” – is the most time consuming. This can be lamented since many analysts prefer the cool modeling aspects (since I want to show my math!
